description:
"AI as the engine, humans as the steering wheel" (in a literal sense)

Endless racer where you try to sip on da sizzuuurp and try to keep the car above 150km/h. Whole game was vibe coded using Gork 4.
problem_solved: I always drive under the influence. My mama says I should grow up and be a real man so I made this game to not put peoples life in danger n so now I don't need to booze cruise in real life when I can do it in a game. The road generation logic is pretty cool too! Pretty modular stuff!
favorite_part:
I am a 3d artist with no knowledge of programming other than VEX or maxscript but I always wanted to make a game. Grok 4 vibe coding made my dream come true!! This is my first game. In the same genre of "Subway Surfers"

parental advisory: codeine + weed
